We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private ExponentialMovingAverage _ema;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_ema = EMA(symbol, period, smoothingFactor);

// In OnData()
if (_ema.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "EMA Current", _ema.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.ema = self.EMA(symbol, period, smoothingFactor)

# In OnData()
if self.ema.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "EMA Current", self.ema.Current);
